info.title: Custom Translator
info.description:
Documentation for the Microsoft Custom Translator API
C# code sample: https://github.com/MicrosoftTranslator/CustomTranslatorApiSamples

delete.description: Accepts a request to undeploy a Hub model deployed to API V3.

parameters.description: Format - int64. Id of the corresponding model in Custom Translator with status Hub Deployed.

Adds users to the workspace. If the user already has permissions to the 
workspace, this  will update their level of permissions to whatever is
specified.

get.description:
### REMARKS ### Projects can be filtered using standard OData $filter syntax. Supported fields and operations: - Name- project name to filter by. Supported operations are 'eq' and 'substringof'. - SourceLanguage- Supported operations are 'eq'. - TargetLanguage- Supported operations are 'eq'. - Category- Supported operations are 'eq'.

Only basic 'and' operator is supported between different field filters. Source language, target language, and category allow for 'or' operator within the group.
Example: /api/texttranslator/v1/projects?$filter=substringof(name, 'Project 1') and status eq 'Deployed' and targetLanguage eq 'de,en'


To sort the returned results please use the standard OData $orderby syntax. Supported fields are: - name- project name to order by. - createdDate- project created date to order by.

Only one orderBy field can be used at a time, else a 404 will be returned.
Example with Name : /api/texttranslator/v1/projects?$orderby=name desc
Example with CreatedDate : /api/texttranslator/v1/projects?$orderby=createdDate asc
get.summary: Gets the list of projects.

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: Format - int32. The page index. Optional, if not provided returns all results.

post.description:
### REMARKS ###
The field 'isAutoTrain' defaults to true if not set. If it is set to false, it 
creates the model in a draft state.

get.description:
### REMARKS ### To sort the returned results please use the standard OData $orderby syntax. Supported fields are: - sourceSentences - Orders documents returned by number of source sentences. - targetSentences - Orders documents returned by number of target sentences. - alignedSentences - Orders documents returned by number of aligned sentences. - usedSentences - Orders documents returned by number of used sentences.

Only one orderBy field can be used at a time, else a 404 will be returned.
Example with SourceSentences : /api/texttranslator/v1/documents?$orderby=sourceSentences desc
Example with TargetSentences : /api/texttranslator/v1/documents?$orderby=targetSentences asc
Example with AlignedSentences: /api/texttranslator/v1/documents?$orderby=alignedSentences desc
Example with UsedSentences: /api/texttranslator/v1/documents?$orderby=usedSentences asc

get.description:
### REMARKS ### Models can be filtered using standard OData $filter syntax. Supported fields and operations: - ModelName - Model name to filter by. Supported operations are 'eq' and 'substringof'. - DocumentType - Returns the model if it uses the given document type. Supported operations are 'eq'. - Status - Current status of the model (for example: 'deployed'). Supported operation is 'eq' and 'or' operator within the group.

Only basic 'and' operator is supported between different field filters. Also no nested conditions are supported.
Example: /api/texttranslator/v1/projects/{id}/models?$filter=substringof(modelName, 'Model 1') and documentType eq 'training' and status eq 'deployed,draft'


To sort the returned results please use the standard OData $orderby syntax. If an $orderby parameter is not provided, default sort order returns any published models first, followed by most recently modified. Supported fields are: - name - Model name to order by - modifiedDate - Model modified date to order by

Only one orderBy field can be used at a time, else a 404 will be returned.
Example with Name : /api/texttranslator/v1/documents?$orderby=name desc
Example with ModifiedDate: /api/texttranslator/v1/documents?$orderby=modifiedDate asc
get.summary: Gets all the Models for the given project.

get.description:
### REMARKS ### Documents can be filtered using standard OData $filter syntax. Supported fields and operations: - Name - document name to filter by. Supported operations are 'eq' and 'substringof'. - DocumentType - Document type filter. Supported operations are 'eq'. Can support multi-selection. - LanguageCode - Language code filter. Supported operations are 'eq' . Can support multi-selection. - IsParallel - Filter by the IsParallel boolean flag. Supported operations are 'eq'. - ProjectLanguages - Filter for documents applicable to a project with the specified language pair. Language pair should be specified with a '->' between the languages. Supported operations are 'eq'.

Only basic 'and' operator is supported between different field filters. DocumentType allow for 'or' operation within the group. Also no nested conditions are supported.
Example: /api/texttranslator/v1/documents?$filter=substringof(Name, 'Document 1') and documentType eq 'training,testing' and languageCode eq 'de' and isParallel eq false
Example with ProjectLanguages - /api/texttranslator/v1/documents?$filter=projectLanguage eq 'en->de'

To sort the returned results please use the standard OData $orderby syntax. Supported fields are: - name- document name to order by. - createdDate- document created date to order by. - documentType- document type to order by - Training,Testing,Tuning, Phrase Dictionary and Sentence Dictionary in ascending or descending.

Only one orderBy field can be used at a time, else a 404 will be returned.
Example with Name : /api/texttranslator/v1/documents?$orderby=name desc
Example with CreatedDate: /api/texttranslator/v1/documents?$orderby=createdDate asc
Example with DocumentType: /api/texttranslator/v1/documents?$orderby=documentType desc
get.summary: Gets the documents.

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: Format - int32. Index of the page.

parameters.name: includeAllDocumentsFields
parameters.description:
Whether or not to return the optional field 'AllDocuments'
            that includes basic information about documents outside the pagination range.

parameters.name: prioritizeModel
parameters.description:
Format - int64. When paginating results, ensures that documents that are part of this model
            are listed before all other documents. If both prioritizeModel and orderby are provided, prioritzeModel will
            be ignored.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Format - int32. Limits the number of items per page. If not provided, defaults to 10.

get.description:
### REMARKS ### Tests can be filtered using standard OData $filter syntax. Supported fields and operations: - TestName - test name to filter by. Supported operations are 'eq' and 'substringof'. - Status - Supported operations are 'eq'.

Only basic 'and' operator is supported between different field filters. Also no nested conditions are supported.
Example: /api/texttranslator/v1/models/{id}/tests?$filter=substringof(testName, 'Test 1') and status eq 'Complete'
get.summary: Gets the list of tests for the model.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Format - int64. The Id of the model to which tests belong.

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: Format - int32. The page index. Default is 1.

get.description:
### REMARKS ### Document import status can be filtered using standard OData $filter syntax. Supported fields and operations: - Name - Filters by document name. Supported operations are 'eq' and 'substringof'. - LanguageCode - Filters by language code. Supported operation is 'eq'. - Status - Filters by the import status. Supported operations are 'eq', 'lt' (less than), 'gt' (greater than). - UploadDateStart - Supported operation is 'ge' (greater than or equal to) - UploadDateEnd - Supported operation is 'le' (less than or equal to)

Only basic 'and' operator is supported between different field filters, and nested conditions are not supported.

Example: /api/texttranslator/v1/documents/import/jobs/all?$filter=substringof(Name, 'Document 1') and languagePair eq 'de,en' and status lt '254'
get.summary: Gets the status of all past document imports

parameters.name: workspaceId
parameters.description: Id for the workspace to fetch the jobs from.

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: Format - int32. Index of the page. If not provided, defaults to returning the first page.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Format - int32. Limits the number of items per page. If not provided, defaults to 10.

get.description:
### REMARKS ### Document import status can be filtered using standard OData $filter syntax. Supported fields and operations: - FileName - Filters by document name. Supported operations are 'eq' and 'substringof'. - LanguageCode - Filters by language code. Supported operation is 'eq'. - Status - Filters by the import status. Supported operation is 'eq', 'lt' (less than), 'gt' (greater than).

Only basic 'and' operator is supported between different field filters, and nested conditions are not supported.

Example: /api/texttranslator/v1/documents/import/jobs/{jobId}?$filter=substringof(FileName, 'Document 1') and languageCode eq 'de' and status lt '254'
get.summary: Gets the status of the document import

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: Format - int32. Index of the page. If not provided, defaults to returning the first page.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Format - int32. Limits the number of items per page. If not provided, defaults to 10.

post.description: Upload files for processing. Documents are created asynchronously. Upload status can be checked using the returned job id
post.summary: Upload files for processing. Documents are created asynchronously. Upload status can be checked using the returned job id

RoleInfo.description: Information about a users role in a workspace.

Id.description: Gets or sets the id for this role.

RoleName.description: Gets or sets the name of this role.

ShareUserInfo.description:
Information about each user a workspace 
has been shared with. Because the user's UserName
may not be yet known (if they haven't signed into
Custom Translator yet), returns EmailAddress instead.

Id.description: Gets or sets the id for the user

EmailAddress.description:
Gets or sets the email address for the user this workspace has been
shared with.

SharingInfo.description: Information about a user that has permissions to a workspace.

Id.description: Gets or sets the share id

TestTranslatorImportFilesResponse.description:
ImportFiles response.
Return the job ids for imported files

JobId.description: Gets or sets the job identifier.

FilesAcceptedForProcessing.description: Gets or sets the files accepted for processing.

TextTranslatorBaseDocumentInfo.description:
Class containing base information about a document. Used for 
select all/none functionality on the front end.

ExtractedSentenceCount.description: Gets or sets extracted sentence count.

UsedByPrioritizedModel.description: Gets or sets if this model is used by the specified prioritized model

BillingRegionCode.description: Gets or sets the billing region (GBL, USW2, etc)

BillingRegionName.description: Gets or sets the billing region name (Global, US West 2, etc)

TextTranslatorCategory.description: Defines a category of the project.

TextTranslatorCreateWorkspaceRequest.description: The input class for creating a new workspace.

Name.description: Gets or sets the name of the workspace

TextTranslatorDocumentInfo.description: Class containing detailed information about document.

ExtractedSentenceCount.description: Gets or sets extracted sentence count.

UsedByPrioritizedModel.description: Gets or sets if this model is used by the specified prioritized model

IsParallel.description: Gets or sets IsParallel - paired/unpaired with source document

Files.description:
Gets or sets the files associated with the document. Each document may have many files, one for each language.
If document has one file, that may mean that only one language data was uploaded for it, and others still need to be provided.

Languages.description: Gets or sets the file languages associated with the document.

IsAvailable.description:
A document is available when it is NOT
1. A monolingual document
2. A dictionary
3. Has a language pair that is not supported

PageIndex.description: Gets or sets the page index.

TotalPageCount.description: Gets or sets the total number of pages.

TextTranslatorDocumentInstance.description: A class containing references to documents and corresponding processed documents.

PageIndex.description: Gets or sets the page index.

TotalPageCount.description: Gets or sets the total number of pages.

Items.description: Gets or sets the items of the document

TotalExtractedSentences.description: Gets or sets the total number of extracted sentences.

TextTranslatorFileInfo.description: A class for the file information.

FileName.description: Gets or sets the File Name

NumberFiles.description:
The number of files represented by this job id. The parent placeholder
for .zip and .tmx files is only included in this count if it is the only
item listed in UploadHistory for the job.

NumberFilesWithErrors.description:
The number of files represented by this job id that have failed. The
parent placeholder for .zip and .tmx files is only included in this count
if it is the only item listed in UploadHistory for the job.

Name.description:
Display name of the job. For .zip/ .tmx files, this is name + extension 
of the parent item. For parallel data this "DocumentName" row 
in the UploadHistory table.

Languages.description: The file languages associated with this document.

TextTranslatorImportAllJobsStatusRespons.description: API results container for TextTranslatorImportAllJobs response.

PageIndex.description: Gets or sets the page index.

TotalPageCount.description: Gets or sets the total number of pages.

Jobs.description: Gets or sets the list of upload jobs.

TextTranslatorImportJobFileStatusInfo.description: Text Translator Import Job File Status

ModifiedDate.description: Gets or sets the date the upload status was last modified

FileName.description: Gets or sets the name of the file.

DocumentName.description: Gets or sets the name of the document.

ParentId.description: Gets or sets the parent identifier.

TextTranslatorImportJobStatus.description: Defines the status of an import job.

DisplayName.description: The display name of the status.

PageIndex.description: Gets or sets the page index.

TotalPageCount.description: Gets or sets the total number of pages.

JobName.description: Gets or sets the name for the job overall

FileProcessingStatus.description: Gets or sets the file processing status.

TextTranslatorLanguage.description: Defines a language that can be used in the text translator.

DisplayName.description: The Display Name of the language

LanguageCode.description: The ISO code of the language

TextTranslatorLanguagePair.description: A language pair that is supported by the text translator for transalation.

Id.description: The Id for the language pair.
Gets or sets the model Id.

Name.description: Gets or sets the name of the model.

ModelIdentifier.description:
Gets the Identifier with which this sytem can be used for translations through our translate API. This field is autogenerated by the 
system when the model is deployed.

ProjectId.description: Gets or sets the Id of the project to which the model belongs.

Documents.description: Gets or sets the list of documents used for training this model

ModelRegionStatuses.description: Gets or sets the Regions this model is deployed in

BaselineBleuScorePunctuated.description: Gets or sets baseline BleuScore (case-sensitive, punctuated).

BaselineBleuScoreUnpunctuated.description: Gets or sets baseline BleuScore (case-sensitive, Unpunctuated).

BaselineBleuScoreCIPunctuated.description: Gets or sets baseline BleuScore (case-insensitive, punctuated).

BaselineBleuScoreCIUnpunctuated.description: Gets or sets baseline BleuScore (case-insensitive, Unpunctuated).

AutoDeployThreshold.description:
Gets or sets the auto deployment bleu score diff threshold. Auto-deploy will occur when the 
bleu score threshold meets or exceeds the specified minimum.

HubBLEUScore.description: Gets or sets the BLEU Score in MT Hub for the given model.

HubCategory.description: Gets the Category of this Model in Hub

RetrainedFromSourceModelId.description: Gets or sets the source model from which this model was scheduled for retraining

TextTranslatorModelRegionStatus.description: Information about a region a model is deployed or not deployed in

IsDeployed.description: Gets or sets the id for this role.

TextTranslatorModelRegionStatusWithName.description: Expanded information about regions a model is deployed in

IsDeployed.description: Gets or sets the id for this role.

RegionName.description: Gets or sets the region name

TextTranslatorModelRequest.description: The input class for model requests.

ProjectId.description: Gets or sets the Id of the project to which the model belongs.

IsAutoTrain.description:
Gets or sets IsAutoTrain. If AutoTrain is not set, 
defaults to true. If AutoTrain is set to false, 
it will create the model in a draft state.

AutoDeployThreshold.description:
Gets or sets the auto deployment bleu score diff threshold. Auto-deploy will occur when the 
bleu score threshold meets or exceeds the specified minimum.

SourceModelIdForRetrain.description: Gets or sets the source model from which this model was scheduled for retraining

TextTranslatorModelUpdateRequest.description: The input class for model update requests.

Name.description: Gets or sets the updated model name.

Documents.description: Gets or sets the ids used by the model

PageIndex.description: Gets or sets the page index.

TotalPageCount.description: Gets or sets the total number of pages.

TextTranslatorProcessedDocumentInfo.description: A class containing information related to the document after it has been processed in a specific model training

ModelId.description: Gets or Sets parent model Id

DocumentId.description: Gets or Sets document set from which the documents were derived

AlignedSentenceCount.description: Aligned sentence count after sentence alignment is executed

UsedSentenceCount.description: Sentences used after filtering and auto selection occur

BaselineBleuScoreCIPunctuated.description: Gets or sets baseline BleuScore (case-insensitive, punctuated).

IsAvailable.description: Maps to the IsAvailable of the unerlying Language pair.

HubCategory.description: Gets the Category of this Model in Hub

HasFreeTraining.description: Gets if this project has a free training available

ModelRegionStatus.description: Gets or sets the regions the model in this project is deployed in

TextTranslatorProjectRequest.description: The input class for model requests.

Label.description: Gets or sets the project label.

LanguagePairId.description: The Id for the language pair.

TextTranslatorProjectUpdateRequest.description: The input class for model update requests.

Label.description: Gets or sets the project label.

PageIndex.description: Gets or sets the page index.

TotalPageCount.description: Gets or sets the total number of pages.

TextTranslatorSubscriptionRequest.description: The input class for subscription requests.

IsCMKEnabled.description: If CMK is enabled on this subscription

TestEntries.description: Gets or sets Test result entries

ReferenceString.description: Gets the reference string. May be null.

General.description:
Gets the general string - this is the translation 
generated by the non-customized baseline

TextTranslatorTestInfo.description: Contains the required details of a Translator Studio Test

ModelId.description: The Model with which the test is associated

BaselineBleuScorePunctuated.description: Gets or sets baseline BleuScore (case-sensitive, punctuated).

BaselineBleuScoreUnpunctuated.description: Gets or sets baseline BleuScore (case-sensitive, Unpunctuated).

BaselineBleuScoreCIPunctuated.description: Gets or sets baseline BleuScore (case-insensitive, punctuated).

BaselineBleuScoreCIUnpunctuated.description: Gets or sets baseline BleuScore (case-insensitive, Unpunctuated).

PageIndex.description: Gets or sets the page index.

TotalPageCount.description: Gets or sets the total number of pages.

Id.description: Gets or sets the workspace id.

Name.description: Gets or sets the name of the workspace.

IsCreator.description: Gets or sets if this user is the creator of the workspace.

IsDefaultWorkspace.description: Gets or sets if this user has this workspace set as their default workspace.

CreatedDate.description: Gets or sets when the workspace was created.

Sharing.description: Gets or sets the information about who this workspace is shared with.

HasMigrations.description: Gets or sets if the current workspace has any migrations.

TextTranslatorWorkspaceNameRequest.description: The input class for change of workspace name requests.

TextTranslatorWorkspacePermissionInfo.description: Class for a single workspace permission request.

EmailAddress.description:
Gets or sets the email address for the user this workspace has been
shared with.

RoleId.description: Gets or sets the id for this role.

TextTranslatorWorkspaceUsersResponse.description: A container for workspace users results

Users.description: Gets or sets information for users with access to this workspace.

Workspaces.description: Gets or sets information for workspaces.

UserInfo.description:
Basic user information - object used for 
CreatedBy/ModifiedBy response fields

Id.description: Gets or Sets the User Id

UserName.description: Gets or Sets the User Name
